qas.question: What is the penalty area marked by?
a penalty foul by the defending team can be punishable by a what?
how many meters from the goalpost does a penalty area extend?
Only who can handle the ball with his hands?
What is the penalty area hidden by?
What can not be used to punish a penalty foul?
How many miles from the goalpost does a penalty area extend?
Who can't handle the ball with his hands?

plausible_answers.text: at kick-offs, goal kicks, penalty kicks and corner kicks

qas.question: Where do markings not define the position of the ball?

context: In front of the goal is the penalty area. This area is marked by the <a0_0>goal line<a0_0/>, two lines starting on the <b4_0>goal line<b4_0/> <a2_0>16.5 m<a2_0/> (18 yd) from the goalposts and extending <b6_0>16.5<b6_0/> m (18 yd) into the pitch perpendicular to the goal line, and a line joining them. This area has a number of functions, the most prominent being to mark where the <a3_0><b7_0>goalkeeper<b7_0/><a3_0/> may handle the ball and where a penalty foul by a member of the defending team becomes punishable by a <a1_0>penalty kick<a1_0/>. Other markings define the position of the ball or players <b8_0>at kick-offs, goal kicks, <b5_0>penalty kicks<b5_0/> and corner kicks<b8_0/>.
